attributes.action: Greg Dyke must resign from his post as chairman of the rotten and dated F.A
attributes.background: Yes we can all blame Woy and the players but for how long can we put up with the state of the national game!  Losing to Iceland was the worst I've ever seen and im sure we all agree just how bad it was. Surely to move forward the entire F.A needs overhauling and Greg Dyke must resign too.

rejection.details: It would be for Greg Dyke to decide whether or not to resign from his FA post.
